title: 87/557/EEC: Commission Decision of 16 November 1987 on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 (Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 16 November 1987
on improving the efficiency of agricultural structures in Portugal pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 797/85
(Only the Portuguese text is authentic)
(87/557/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Taking into account the provisions relating to the fixation of the reference income for 1987, the measures adopted in Portugal pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 797/85 continue to meet the conditions for a financial contribution from the Community to the common measure provided for in Article 1 of Regulation (EEC) No 797/85.
This Decision is addressed to Portugal.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 November 1987.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 93, 30. 3. 1985, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 167, 26. 6. 1987, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 115, 3. 5. 1986, p. 17.
